entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
